member.name: T:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.Designer.DragDropExceptionHandler
member.summary: When the designer is hosted in a Windows.Forms application, exceptions in drag'n'drop handlers are silently ignored. Applications hosting the designer should listen to the event and provide their own exception handling method. If no event listener is registered, exceptions will call Environment.FailFast.

member.summary: Event that occors when an unhandled exception occurs during drag'n'drop operators.

member.summary: Raises the UnhandledException event, or calls Environment.FailFast if no event handlers are present.

member.name: T:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.Designer.Extensions.PanelInstanceFactory
member.summary: Instance factory used to create Panel instances.
